scene_description_enriched: Two women stand facing each other against a red, gold-patterned background. The woman on the left wears a blue undergarment and a flowing golden mantle and hood, with her hands clasped or resting near her waist. The woman on the right wears a blue outer garment over a pink undergarment, with a white headdress. Her hands are clasped in prayer. The ground beneath them is depicted as green. The scene is likely devotional, possibly representing the Visitation or a similar encounter between two holy women.
